body.p: A period of time which is required to be defined for reporting purposes.
It may be of a calendar or financial nature and may be, for example, a day, a week, a month, a quarterÂ or a year.

The REPORTING PERIOD START DATE and REPORTING PERIOD END DATE are inclusive within the REPORTING PERIOD . For example, a REPORTING PERIOD of 1st October to 31st October includes any activity occurring on the 1st October and 31st October as well as all other dates within October.
